title: Commutes relation for Hilbert lattice elements

blocks.name: df-cm
blocks.content: Define the commutes relation (on the Hilbert lattice). Definition of commutes in [Kalmbach] p. 20, who uses the notation xCy for "x commutes with y." See ~ cmbri for membership relation. (Contributed by NM, 14-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: cmbr
blocks.content: Binary relation expressing ` A ` commutes with ` B ` . Definition of commutes in [Kalmbach] p. 20. (Contributed by NM, 14-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm cmbr(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wb(wbr(c0, ccm, c1), wceq(c0, co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cin(c0, cfv(cort, c1))))))
} = {
  bianabs(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wbr(c0, ccm, c1), wceq(c0, co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cin(c0, cfv(cort, c1)))))
  brabg(hs0, hs1, c0, cch, c1, cch, ccm, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wceq(c0, co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cin(c0, cfv(cort, c1))))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cch), wcel(cv(hs1), cch)), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), chj, cin(cv(hs0), cfv(cort, cv(hs1)))))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(cv(hs1), cch)), wceq(c0, co(cin(c0, cv(hs1)), chj, cin(c0, cfv(cort, cv(hs1)))))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cch), wcel(cv(hs1), cch)), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), chj, cin(cv(hs0), cfv(cort, cv(hs1))))), wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(cv(hs1), cch)), wceq(c0, co(cin(c0, cv(hs1)), chj, cin(c0, cfv(cort, cv(hs1))))))
  anbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cch), wcel(cv(hs1), cch), wcel(c0, cch))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c0, cch)
  eqeq12d(cv(hs0), co(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), chj, cin(cv(hs0), cfv(cort, cv(hs1)))), c0, co(cin(c0, cv(hs1)), chj, cin(c0, cfv(cort, cv(hs1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq12d(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), chj, cin(cv(hs0), cfv(cort, cv(hs1))), cin(c0, cv(hs1)), cin(c0, cfv(cort, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  ineq1(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))
  ineq1(cv(hs0), c0, cfv(cort, cv(hs1)))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(cv(hs1), cch)), wceq(c0, co(cin(c0, cv(hs1)), chj, cin(c0, cfv(cort, cv(hs1))))), wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wceq(c0, co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cin(c0, cfv(cort, c1)))))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(c0, cch), wcel(cv(hs1), cch), wcel(c1, cch))
  eleq1(cv(hs1), c1, cch)
  eqeq2d(c0, co(cin(c0, cv(hs1)), chj, cin(c0, cfv(cort, cv(hs1)))), co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cin(c0, cfv(cort, c1))), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  oveq12d(cin(c0, cv(hs1)), chj, cin(c0, cfv(cort, cv(hs1))), cin(c0, c1), cin(c0, cfv(cort, c1)), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  ineq2(cv(hs1), c1, c0)
  ineq2d(c0, cfv(cort, cv(hs1)), cfv(cort, c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  fveq2(cv(hs1), c1, cort)
  df-cm(hs0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wceq(c0, co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cin(c0, cfv(cort, c1))))))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wceq(c0, co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cin(c0, cfv(cort, c1))))))
}

thm cmbr(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH)→(c0[C_H]c1 ↔ c0 =((c0 ⋂ c1)[vH](c0 ⋂(_|_ ` c1)))))
} = {
  bianabs((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH), c0[C_H]c1, c0 =((c0 ⋂ c1)[vH](c0 ⋂(_|_ ` c1))))
  brabg(hs0, hs1, c0, cch, c1, cch, ccm, ((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH)∧ c0 =((c0 ⋂ c1)[vH](c0 ⋂(_|_ ` c1)))), ((hs0 ∈ CH ∧ hs1 ∈ CH)∧ hs0 =((hs0 ⋂ hs1)[vH](hs0 ⋂(_|_ ` hs1)))), ((c0 ∈ CH ∧ hs1 ∈ CH)∧ c0 =((c0 ⋂ hs1)[vH](c0 ⋂(_|_ ` hs1)))))
  anbi12d(hs0 = c0, (hs0 ∈ CH ∧ hs1 ∈ CH), hs0 =((hs0 ⋂ hs1)[vH](hs0 ⋂(_|_ ` hs1))), (c0 ∈ CH ∧ hs1 ∈ CH), c0 =((c0 ⋂ hs1)[vH](c0 ⋂(_|_ ` hs1))))
  anbi1d(hs0 = c0, hs0 ∈ CH, hs1 ∈ CH, c0 ∈ CH)
  eleq1(hs0, c0, cch)
  eqeq12d(hs0, ((hs0 ⋂ hs1)[vH](hs0 ⋂(_|_ ` hs1))), c0, ((c0 ⋂ hs1)[vH](c0 ⋂(_|_ ` hs1))), hs0 = c0)
  id(hs0 = c0)
  oveq12d((hs0 ⋂ hs1), chj, (hs0 ⋂(_|_ ` hs1)), (c0 ⋂ hs1), (c0 ⋂(_|_ ` hs1)), hs0 = c0)
  ineq1(hs0, c0, hs1)
  ineq1(hs0, c0, (_|_ ` hs1))
  anbi12d(hs1 = c1, (c0 ∈ CH ∧ hs1 ∈ CH), c0 =((c0 ⋂ hs1)[vH](c0 ⋂(_|_ ` hs1))), (c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH), c0 =((c0 ⋂ c1)[vH](c0 ⋂(_|_ ` c1))))
  anbi2d(hs1 = c1, c0 ∈ CH, hs1 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH)
  eleq1(hs1, c1, cch)
  eqeq2d(c0, ((c0 ⋂ hs1)[vH](c0 ⋂(_|_ ` hs1))), ((c0 ⋂ c1)[vH](c0 ⋂(_|_ ` c1))), hs1 = c1)
  oveq12d((c0 ⋂ hs1), chj, (c0 ⋂(_|_ ` hs1)), (c0 ⋂ c1), (c0 ⋂(_|_ ` c1)), hs1 = c1)
  ineq2(hs1, c1, c0)
  ineq2d(c0, (_|_ ` hs1), (_|_ ` c1), hs1 = c1)
  fveq2(hs1, c1, cort)
  df-cm(hs0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH)∧ c0 =((c0 ⋂ c1)[vH](c0 ⋂(_|_ ` c1)))))
  diff.hs1.w(((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH)∧ c0 =((c0 ⋂ c1)[vH](c0 ⋂(_|_ ` c1)))))
}

blocks.name: pjoml2i
blocks.content: Variation of orthomodular law. Definition in [Kalmbach] p. 22. (Contributed by NM, 31-Oct-2000.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm pjoml2i(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wss(c0, c1), wceq(co(c0, chj, cin(cfv(cort, c0), c1)), c1))
  -| wcel(c0, cch)
  -| wcel(c1, cch)
} = {
  sylancl(wss(c0, c1), wceq(co(c0, chj, cin(cfv(cort, c0), c1)), c1), wss(co(c0, chj, cin(cfv(cort, c0), c1)), c1), wceq(cin(c1, cfv(cort, co(c0, chj, cin(cfv(cort, c0), c1)))), c0h))
  mpan2(wss(c0, c1), wss(co(c0, chj, cin(cfv(cort, c0), c1)), c1), wss(cin(cfv(cort, c0), c1), c1))
  inss2(cfv(cort, c0), c1)
  chlubii(c0, c1, cin(cfv(cort, c0), c1))
  eqtri(cin(c1, cfv(cort, co(c0, chj, cin(cfv(cort, c0), c1)))), c0h, cin(c1, cin(cfv(cort, c0), cfv(cort, cin(cfv(cort, c0), c1)))))
  ineq2i(c1, cfv(cort, co(c0, chj, cin(cfv(cort, c0), c1))), cin(cfv(cort, c0), cfv(cort, cin(cfv(cort, c0), c1))))
  chdmj1i(c0, cin(cfv(cort, c0), c1))
  3eqtr3i(cin(c1, cin(cfv(cort, c0), cfv(cort, cin(cfv(cort, c0), c1)))), c0h, cin(cin(c1, cfv(cort, c0)), cfv(cort, cin(cfv(cort, c0), c1))), cin(cin(cfv(cort, c0), c1), cfv(cort, cin(cfv(cort, c0), c1))))
  ineq1i(cin(c1, cfv(cort, c0)), cfv(cort, cin(cfv(cort, c0), c1)), cin(cfv(cort, c0), c1))
  incom(c1, cfv(cort, c0))
  inass(c1, cfv(cort, c0), cfv(cort, cin(cfv(cort, c0), c1)))
  chocini(cin(cfv(cort, c0), c1))
  pjomli(co(c0, chj, cin(cfv(cort, c0), c1)), c1)
  chjcli(c0, cin(cfv(cort, c0), c1))
  chincli(cfv(cort, c0), c1)
  choccli(c0)
  chshii(c1)
}

  eqcom(cfv(cort, co(cfv(cort, c1), chj, cin(cfv(cort, cfv(cort, c1)), cfv(cort, c0)))), c0)
  eqeq1i(cfv(cort, co(cfv(cort, c1), chj, cin(cfv(cort, cfv(cort, c1)), cfv(cort, c0)))), c0, cin(c1, co(cfv(cort, c1), chj, c0)))
  eqtri(cfv(cort, co(cfv(cort, c1), chj, cin(cfv(cort, cfv(cort, c1)), cfv(cort, c0)))), cin(c1, co(cfv(cort, c1), chj, c0)), cin(c1, cfv(cort, cin(cfv(cort, cfv(cort, c1)), cfv(cort, c0)))))
  chdmj2i(c1, cin(cfv(cort, cfv(cort, c1)), cfv(cort, c0)))

  chcon2i(c0, co(cfv(cort, c1), chj, cin(cfv(cort, cfv(cort, c1)), cfv(cort, c0))))

  oveq2i(cin(c0, c1), chj, cin(cfv(cort, cin(c0, c1)), c1), cin(c1, co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c1))))
  eqtri(cin(cfv(cort, cin(c0, c1)), c1), cin(c1, co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c1))), cin(co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c1)), c1))

  inss2(c0, c1)

  ax-mp(wss(co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cin(c1, co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c1)))), co(c0, chj, cin(c1, co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c1))))), wss(cin(c0, c1), c0))

blocks.name: pjoml6i
blocks.content: An equivalent of the orthomodular law. Theorem 29.13(e) of [MaedaMaeda] p. 132. (Contributed by NM, 30-May-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm pjoml6i(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wss(c0, c1), wrex(s0, cch, wa(wss(c0, cfv(cort, cv(s0))), wceq(co(c0, chj, cv(s0)), c1))))
  -| wcel(c0, cch)
  -| wcel(c1, cch)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  sylancr(wss(c0, c1), wrex(s0, cch, wa(wss(c0, cfv(cort, cv(s0))), wceq(co(c0, chj, cv(s0)), c1))), wcel(cin(cfv(cort, c0), c1), cch), wa(wss(c0, cfv(cort, cin(cfv(cort, c0), c1))), wceq(co(c0, chj, cin(cfv(cort, c0), c1)), c1)))
  chincli(cfv(cort, c0), c1)
  choccli(c0)
  jctil(wss(c0, c1), wss(c0, cfv(cort, cin(cfv(cort, c0), c1))), wceq(co(c0, chj, cin(cfv(cort, c0), c1)), c1))
  pjoml2i(c0, c1)
  sseqtr4i(c0, cfv(cort, cin(cfv(cort, c0), c1)), co(c0, chj, cfv(cort, c1)))
  chub1i(c0, cfv(cort, c1))
  choccli(c1)
  chdmm2i(c0, c1)
  rspcev(s0, cin(cfv(cort, c0), c1), cch, wa(wss(c0, cfv(cort, cin(cfv(cort, c0), c1))), wceq(co(c0, chj, cin(cfv(cort, c0), c1)), c1)), wa(wss(c0, cfv(cort, cv(s0))), wceq(co(c0, chj, cv(s0)), c1)))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cin(cfv(cort, c0), c1)), wss(c0, cfv(cort, cv(s0))), wceq(co(c0, chj, cv(s0)), c1), wss(c0, cfv(cort, cin(cfv(cort, c0), c1))), wceq(co(c0, chj, cin(cfv(cort, c0), c1)), c1))
  sseq2d(c0, cfv(cort, cv(s0)), cfv(cort, cin(cfv(cort, c0), c1)), wceq(cv(s0), cin(cfv(cort, c0), c1)))
  fveq2(cv(s0), cin(cfv(cort, c0), c1), cort)
  eqeq1d(co(c0, chj, cv(s0)), c1, co(c0, chj, cin(cfv(cort, c0), c1)), wceq(cv(s0), cin(cfv(cort, c0), c1)))
  oveq2(cv(s0), cin(cfv(cort, c0), c1), c0, chj)
  diff.cch.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wss(c0, cfv(cort, cin(cfv(cort, c0), c1))), wceq(co(c0, chj, cin(cfv(cort, c0), c1)), c1))
  diff.wss.s(s0, c0, cfv(cort, cin(cfv(cort, c0), c1)))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cort, cin(cfv(cort, c0), c1))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, co(c0, chj, cin(cfv(cort, c0), c1)), c1)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, chj, cin(cfv(cort, c0), c1))
  diff.chj.s(s0)
  diff.cin.s(s0, cfv(cort, c0), c1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cort, c0)

blocks.name: cmcmlem
blocks.content: Commutation is symmetric. Theorem 3.4 of [Beran] p. 45. (Contributed by NM, 3-Nov-2000.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm cmcmlem(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wbr(c0, ccm, c1), wbr(c1, ccm, c0))
  -| wcel(c0, cch)
  -| wcel(c1, cch)
} = {
  3imtr4i(wbr(c0, ccm, c1), wbr(c1, ccm, c0), wceq(c0, co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cin(c0, cfv(cort, c1)))), wceq(c1, co(cin(c1, c0), chj, cin(c1, cfv(cort, c0)))))
  3eqtr3g(c1, co(cin(c1, c0), chj, cin(c1, cfv(cort, c0))), co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cin(cfv(cort, cin(c0, c1)), c1)), co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cin(cfv(cort, c0), c1)), wceq(c0, co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cin(c0, cfv(cort, c1)))))

  imbi12d(wceq(c1, cif(c1, c0h, wcel(c1, cch))), wss(cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch)), c1), wbr(cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch)), ccm, c1), wss(cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch)), cif(c1, c0h, wcel(c1, cch))), wbr(cif(c0, c0h, wcel(c0, cch)), ccm, cif(c1, c0h, wcel(c1, cch))))
